\LoggerLoggingEvent

The internal representation of logging event.

Properties

$timeStamp

$timeStamp : float

The number of seconds elapsed from 1/1/1970 until logging event was created plus microseconds if available.

Type

float

Tags

$categoryName

$categoryName :

The category (logger) name.

This field will be marked as private in future releases. Please do not access it directly. Use the \getLoggerName() method instead.

Type

Deprecated

Tags

None found

$ndc

$ndc : string

The nested diagnostic context (NDC) of logging event.

Type

string

Tags

None found

$ndcLookupRequired

$ndcLookupRequired : boolean

Have we tried to do an NDC lookup? If we did, there is no need to do it again. Note that its value is always false when serialized. Thus, a receiving SocketNode will never use it's own (incorrect) NDC. See also writeObject method.

Type

boolean

Tags

None found

$message

$message : mixed

Type

mixed — The application supplied message of logging event.

Tags

None found

$renderedMessage

$renderedMessage : string

The application supplied message rendered through the log4php objet rendering mechanism. At present renderedMessage == message.

Type

string

Tags

None found

$threadName

$threadName : mixed

The name of thread in which this logging event was generated.

log4php saves here the process id via \PHP_MANUAL#getmypid

Type

mixed

Tags

None found

$locationInfo

$locationInfo : \LoggerLocationInfo

Type

\LoggerLocationInfo — Location information for the caller.

Tags

None found

$throwableInfo

$throwableInfo : \LoggerThrowableInformation

Type

\LoggerThrowableInformation — log4php internal representation of throwable

Tags

None found

Methods

__construct()

__construct(string  $fqcn, mixed  $logger, \LoggerLevel  $level, mixed  $message, integer  $timeStamp = null, \Exception  $throwable = null)

Instantiate a LoggingEvent from the supplied parameters.

Except \$timeStamp all the other fields of LoggerLoggingEvent are filled when actually needed.

Parameters

string $fqcn

name of the caller class.
mixed $logger

The {@link Logger} category of this event or the logger name.
\LoggerLevel $level

The level of this event.
mixed $message

The message of this event.
integer $timeStamp

the timestamp of this logging event.
\Exception $throwable

The throwable associated with logging event

getLocationInformation()

getLocationInformation() : \LoggerLocationInfo

Set the location information for this logging event. The collected information is cached for future use.

This method uses \PHP_MANUAL#debug_backtrace function (if exists) to collect informations about caller.

It only recognize informations generated by [Logger](../classes/Logger.html) and its subclasses.

Warning: count(): Parameter must be an array or an object that implements Countable in /opt/phpdoc/vendor/twig/twig/lib/Twig/Extension/Core.php on line 1275 Warning: count(): Parameter must be an array or an object that implements Countable in /opt/phpdoc/vendor/twig/twig/lib/Twig/Extension/Core.php on line 1275

Returns

getNDC()

getNDC() : string

This method returns the NDC for this event. It will return the correct content even if the event was generated in a different thread or even on a different machine. The {@link LoggerNDC::get()} method should <b>never</b> be called directly.

Warning: count(): Parameter must be an array or an object that implements Countable in /opt/phpdoc/vendor/twig/twig/lib/Twig/Extension/Core.php on line 1275 Warning: count(): Parameter must be an array or an object that implements Countable in /opt/phpdoc/vendor/twig/twig/lib/Twig/Extension/Core.php on line 1275

getTime()
